verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And the <S%H4172>fear<s%> of you and the <S%H2844>terror<s%> of you shall be on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> with <S%H3605>everything<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> they are <S%H5414>given.<s%>

<S%H3605>"Every<s%> <S%H7431>moving<s%> <S%H7431>thing<s%> that is <S%H2416>alive<s%> shall be <S%H402>food<s%> for you; I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> to you, as [I gave] the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>plant.<s%>
<S%H389>"Only<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with its <S%H5315>life,<s%> [that is,] its <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

"And <S%H389>surely<s%> I will <S%H1875>require<s%> your <S%H1818>lifeblood<s%><S%H5315>;<s%> from <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> I will <S%H1875>require<s%> it. And from <S%H376>[every<s%>] <S%H120>man,<s%> from every <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%> I will <S%H1875>require<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of man.

"Whoever <S%H8210>sheds<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood,<s%> By <S%H120>man<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H8210>shed,<s%> For in the <S%H6754>image<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> man.
"And as for you, be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply;<s%> <S%H8317>Populate<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> in it."
Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H589>Myself<s%> do <S%H6965>establish<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, and with your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you;

and with <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with you, the <S%H5775>birds,<s%> the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> with you; of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> even <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And I <S%H6965>establish<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you; and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> by the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there <S%H5750>again<s%> be a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H226>sign<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5414>making<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with you, for <S%H5769>all<s%> <S%H5769>successive<s%> <S%H1755>generations;<s%>
I <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H7198>bow<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and it shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> of a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, when I <S%H9422>bring<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that the <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%>

and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> shall the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

"When the <S%H7198>bow<s%> is in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> then I will <S%H7200>look<s%> upon it, to <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H226>sign<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> were <S%H8035>Shem<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth;<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham<s%> was the father of <S%H1>Canaan.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah;<s%> and from <S%H428>these<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H9339>populated.<s%>
Then <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> <S%H376>farming<s%> <S%H127><s%> and <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>
And he <S%H8354>drank<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H7937>became<s%> <S%H7937>drunk,<s%> and <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> himself <S%H8432>inside<s%> his <S%H168>tent.<s%>
And <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> the father of <S%H1>Canaan,<s%> <S%H3667>saw<s%> the <S%H7200>nakedness<s%> of his father, and <S%H6172>told<s%> his <S%H1>two<s%> <S%H5046>brothers<s%> <S%H8147>outside.<s%>

But <S%H8035>Shem<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H8071>garment<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it upon <S%H8147>both<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of their father; and their <S%H1>faces<s%> were <S%H6440>turned<s%> <S%H322>away,<s%> so that they did not <S%H322>see<s%> their father's <S%H7200>nakedness.<s%>
When <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H3196>wine,<s%> he <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> his <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.
So he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H779>"Cursed<s%> be <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> A <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H5650>servants<s%> He shall be to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>"
He also <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> And let <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> be his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
"May <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9464>enlarge<s%> <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> And let him <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> And let <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> be his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
